casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Darrell Wayne MANESS. No. 402A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 29, 2008. Katherine Jane Allen, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Maness. William B. Crumpler, Assistant Attorney General, Barry S. McNeill, Special Deputy Attorney General, Rex Gore, District Attorney, for State of NC.

*892The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 28th day of January 2008 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Defendant (Maness) shall have up to and including the 28th day of March 2008 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 29th day of January 2008."
